attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
My experience comes from working in the hospitality industry for over 25 years. Front of house, back of house and everywhere in between. I found the best way to be good at my job is to know all the ins and outs of every position, so thats what I did. Bartend, manage, serve, cook and clean...I did it all! My days are spent in the kitchen baking, learning and creating. I can honestly say there is no better feeling than creating new and beautiful desserts. From the flavour profile to the last little decorative detail that goes on at the end.

Chef Tamera Clark

Gourmet Dessert Bars 
Breakfast, lunch & drink offerings 
Catering & Wholesale 
Weddings Sweet Tables & Cakes

Open daily starting at 12pm, Happy hour from 3-6pm.  North Vancouver's only VPN Certified Neapolitan Pizzeria.

We specialize in the art of Southern Style Barbecue, the real authentic, low and slow way of cooking food over wood fires and coals. We are located in  North Vancouver BC and service the entire lower mainland. If you are planning  a business party, wedding, rehearsal dinner, sports tournament, family reunion, anniversary, wrap party, or just about any kind of celebration, you can relax with friends or family and leave the cooking to us. We bring along our custom made BBQ smoker from the state of Georgia and add a special kind of flair to your event.  Whether it is a smaller group, or a few thousand, we will make you some of  the best "award winning barbecue" that you will ever eat.

We are proud to be part of a community that recognizes the importance and value of supporting small family farms. Whether you're looking for something to dig into at a table with friends or take away, our full menu has you covered daily for breakfast, lunch and brunch. Chicken and waffles, eggs benny, all-day breakfast, diner, brunch all day.

The Cliff House restaurant will offer visitors a welcome respite after a busy day of touring the Park.
*The Cliff House Restaurant is accessible only to guests of Capilano Suspension Bridge Park
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located in beautiful Capilano Suspension Bridge Park, the Cliff House overlooks the Capilano Canyon and is nestled in the West Coast rainforest, the 150-seat indoor & outdoor restaurant focuses on local ingredients, Ocean Wise seafood products, BC wines and locally crafted beers on tap.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We brings Asian infusion to North Vancouver. With our unique twist on Chinese food, you're sure to find a dish that you'll love. We start with only the freshest ingredients to stir fry delicious melodies of tastes and colors that are sure to delight the senses.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: One More Szechuan Chinese Cuisine brings Asian infusion to North Vancouver. With our unique twist on Chinese food, you're sure to find a dish that you'll love. attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Linzi is our acting Store Coach in Lonsdale. She started with Rosemary Rocksalt as an Artisan 3 years ago. She is an amazing part of our team. When she isn't whipping the bagel world into shape she is in a yoga class!
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Rosemary Rocksalt started as a relation to our close friend Siegel's Bagels. They were fortunate enough to have the friends during their first years. 
 As Rosemary Rocksalt grew we began to take our own path in the bagel experience. Stretching our legs and bringing a strong focus of service and guest experience to a quick service market. We are proud to serving Montreal-style bagels the Rosemary Rocksalt Way.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Bagels, Montreal Smoked Meat, Bagel Sandwiches.

Rosemary Rocksalt's #RealBagels begin with the highest quality ingredients available, are kettle boiled, and then baked in a 10,000 pound stone-hearth flame oven.

Rosemary Rocksalt sells authentic Montreal-style bagels and bagel sandwiches.  We bake throughout the day, providing customers with the freshest bagels in town.  In Montreal-style tradition, Rosemary Rocksalt bagels are boiled and then baked in a fire oven.  Boiling the bagel stops the rising process that normally occurs in bread and rolls.  By halting the rising process, Rosemary Rocksalt achieves a crunchy crust and soft chewy center.  We do not use any additives, preservatives or artificial colouring.

Come enjoy our #RealBagels. Always softer, heartier, and chewier!

We have Moved - Right Next Door!  Voted as one of the "Best Five Greek Restaurants" in the Lower Mainland by The Pr?ovince newspaper, Kypriaki's menu features fresh ingredients cooked to exceptional standards. Come visit us at our new, larger location where we continue to build on the reputation established since owner David Edward took over the 40-year-old restaurant in 2000. Additions to the new location include a casual dining area with bar, large projection televisions and a 40 seat patio. Try Authentic Greek favorites and other delicious menu items inspired by the healthy Mediterranean diet. Our grilled-to-perfection souvlaki and melt-in-your-mouth roast lamb are signature dishes that will keep you coming back again and again. We also have many gluten-free and vegetarian menu items.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: One of the first Neighbourhood Pubs to open in North Vancouver, The Queens Cross sits at the top of the Lonsdale business corridor at Queens Road and Lonsdale.  It is a true Neighbourhood Pub where many patrons have been visiting since day one.  It has always been a place for people of all age groups (must be of legal drinking age) to meet with friends, hang out and take in the atmosphere.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We set the standard in good quality pub food.  Draft beer is always served in a 20 ounce pint and there is always a great view of the game or TV event in HD.   Live entertainment on weekends and a great atmosphere for teams and groups.  Outdoor patio gets sunshine all day and the upstairs room is perfect for private parties and large groups.  For over thirty years, the Queens Cross has been a local favorite with a warm atmosphere and friendly staff and patrons.

Welcome to Mehman Restaurant Persian & Afghan Cuisine in North Vancouver.
Mehman Restaurant Persian & Afghan Cuisine is situated in Lonsdale Av. North Vancouver. Mehman Restaurant takes an all-round Middle Eastern approach and is bright, airy and easy going, exotic and friendly.
Mehman Restaurant Persian & Afghan Cuisine provide a delicious and healthy meal for any taste preference, from the heartiest appetite to the lightest diet.
We look forward to welcoming you soon at Mehman Restaurant Persian & Afghan Cuisine.
Mehman Restaurant the contemporary styled Persian & Afghan Grill, invite you to a culinary experience that has been shaped by one of the oldest and most refined cuisines in the world, one which has influenced many dishes in other countries near and far.
Mehman Restaurant benefits from ample parking nearby and it's open all day starting with great lunch and dinner time offers.
In this relax family oriented environment you will find a friendly service accompanying great food cooked from fresh ingredients using a subtle blend of spices and marinates. 
Mehman Restaurant is a friendly location for you, your family and friends lunches.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Andreas is the original owner and founder of Andreas Restaurant, established in 1984, located in North Vancouver and Langley. With strong Greek traditions, Andreas aimed to create a welcoming and comfortable restaurant for families and friends, for parties and celebrations, where all customers could relax and enjoy the pleasures of good food, wine, and company.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
In the 1960's, Andreas and Matina immigrated from Greece and made North Vancouver their home. Their passion for food, Andreas' extensive knowledge of meats, putting the finest butchers to shame, and Matina's famous family recipes of sauces, desserts, and of course, that great loaf of bread passed down from her mother, motivated them to open their first restaurant in 1984. Together, they brought high quality, savory flavors, and authentic Greek traditions to the North Shore. 
A fundamental Greek custom is that of showing friendship to guests, and the Ancient Greek concept of hospitality is "philoxenia", translated as hospitality, generosity, and courtesy shown to guests.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Andreas Restaurant which continues to be family owned and operated has achieved iconic stature as a local authentic neighbourhood place. Customer favourites include the Ten Rich Toppings pizza, the famous Greek Platter, Baked Lasagne, and the best Kleftiko outside of Greece. Which one will be your favourite?

Fryingpan Express: Best Fried Chicken in North Vancouver. Crispy Nashville-style chicken, spice your way. Perfect for lunch, dinner, or a quick bite. Located at 1455 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver. Fresh, halal, fast—no fuss, just bold flavors.

Tequila Cantina Located at 1933 Lonsdale Street with plenty of parking, Tequila Cantina is your go-to destination for authentic Mexican cuisine in a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere. We pride ourselves on serving the finest, freshest ingredients inspired by the rich flavour of Mexico  . 
Every Friday night, immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere with live mariachi music, adding a festive touch to your dining experience,  We also cater to all dietary preferences with our delicious vegetarian menu and a fun, tasty kids' menu to keep our younger guests happy. 

At Tequila Cantina, we offer a memorable dining experience with a welcoming atmosphere and excellent service. Come and enjoy the authentic flavors of Mexico!

Located at 1409 Marine Dr, North Vancouver, BC, Tim Hortons is the perfect place to go for freshly brewed coffee. Our coffee is made with 100% Arabica beans, sourced from the world's most renowned growing regions. We also offer specialty beverages including lattes, cappuccinos, espresso, iced and frozen coffee, hot chocolate, tea and real fruit Quenchers. Grab a quick snack or delicious meal for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Enjoy our freshly cracked Canadian eggs until 4pm. Try one of our delectable baked goods; cookies, muffins, Timbits, and donuts including our delicious Dream Donuts. We also offer a range of soups; Chicken Noodle, Cream of Broccoli and Chili which goes great with our potato wedges made with Canadian potatoes.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The little sub shop that began in 1981 in Denver, CO still has the same bold ideas that we had in the beginning. We boldly believe that your food should taste great and that we should use only the highest quality ingredients to create your perfect lunch.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are on a mission to craft inventive food with real ingredients that remind you great flavor doesn't have to be fussy. We serve up delicious food made with high-quality, authentic ingredients.

We offer home/mama made authentic Persian food! Healthy, mouthwatering, aromatic foods that will take you for an adventure to the heart of Iran! Come and enjoy our unique cuisine and delicious meals freshly prepared with Mama Sabi’s love and passion for cooking!
Mama Sabi is a mother of five and grandma of dozen children well known for her cooking skills!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: A proven leader in the restaurant industry, I have built a reputation of cooking truly authentic Greek cuisine.  My mission is to influence and inspire good nutrition and healthy eating habits by sharing my family's time honoured authentic traditional recipes that are made with all natural quality ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Growing up as a little boy in a traditional Greek household my mother made everything from "scratch" using only the freshest and the highest quality ingredients. When I was in my teens my father opened a Greek restaurant in North Vancouver and I started working in the kitchen learning traditional Greek cooking from his Greek chefs. They taught me to cook with the finest ingredients to create quality dishes with flavour that honoured my heritage.

Each year I looked forward to traveling to Greece to visit my "yiayia", my grandma. Her home cooked meals were always the highlight of my visit. There was nothing like the freshly picked sun-ripened vegetables from her garden and from the local markets. The memories are still fresh in my mind to this day.

It has been a dream of mine to introduce to you food that is delicious, memorable, natural and healthy.  I founded "O SO GREEK" to share my family's time honoured authentic traditional recipes that have been passed down for generations.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
O So Greek Food Ltd. - Traditional Family Recipes

O So Greek - Specialty Products
  
O So Greek - Catering

attributes.about_this_biz_history: OEB was established in 2009; in Calgary - a Canadian city with big potential and small-town values.  We pride ourselves on a vision that supports our people - from farming partners to chefs, managers, employees, and finally, our incredible guests. We aim to invest in, educate and broaden horizons with every connection we make.  The people at OEB possess a deep love of food, giving staff the confidence to excite and welcome guests. The OEB menu is purposeful, filled with items that simply can't be made at home, balanced by lighter fare and vegan options. There is heart and integrity behind the quick, well-executed service at OEB, and employees take the initiative to get to know each other and guests personally. Understanding that breakfast is the best place for honest, good connection.  With distinct locations and plans to grow, OEB pushes the culinary boundaries of breakfast food to bring you the best in quality and craftsmanship - and we're sticking to it.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: OEB Breakfast Co. specializes in delivering brunch like no one else. As we look to push the culinary boundaries of breakfast customers can find creative offerings with items such as the Hog & Scallops Signature Breakfast Poutine, Canadian Lobster Scramble Crepe, and the French Toast Trifle!

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
When Andrew Started Rebellious Tomato 10 years ago, he wanted to create fabulous food to satisfy his pregnant wife's cravings without compromising her health. He chose The Organic Concept.

Andrew chooses fresh, organic ingredients (when possible) that appeal to everyone, including toddlers, mother-to-be, and seniors.

Our pizzas represent great taste and good nutrition. That's why we have been voted "Best Pizza" in Vancouver and the North Shore again and again! Give us a call tonight and enjoy a delicious meal with the whole family!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Bhupinder is in restaurant business for more than 20 years now.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Palki Indian Restaurant first opened the North Vancouver location in 2000 and has been serving loyal customers for the past 13 years.
'Palki' a tradition as old as the sub-continent we call India, Pakistan, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka. It is a carriage, painstakingly made of wood, and decorated with fine stones, intricate carving and adorned with fresh flowers and garlands. It is a vehicle we take on the most momentous journeys of our lives, the one we call 'Marriage'. The Palki also took Nobles and Kinsmen on important tours across the country.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lovers of cooking and baking. After 10 years of working in the food and beverage industry, we wanted to start over our own thing with one of the smallest carts here, YVR. We are happy when pork butt is being braised, mushrooms are being chopped, and butter is melting. Our dream only gets bigger with food lovers like you
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Cooking, Eating and Laughing is what makes us happy and happier. Ohh, can't miss drinking. We wanted to share what makes us happy with people like you.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are offering simple and bold Korean inspired dishes including Rice Bowls with a choice of BBQ Pork, Chili Chicken, Beef Meatball and Vegan Tofu.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Jordan Kim recently opened his own restaurant at 1564 Lonsdale, North Vancouver. Jordan has been renowned to the customers in North and West Vancouver since he took his role of the executive chef of Bene sushi on Marine Dr. West Vancouver. 
Jordan was interviewed and featured by Vancouver Sun (July 26th 2012) through the article introducing "Rum Flamed Sushi" that he had originated, and invited by Vancouver Art Gallery in the capacity of Japanese major chef in 2013. He also took the 3rd and 4th place at the contest 'Taste of Ambleside" held by "West Vancouver Chamber of Commerce" in 2013 and 2014 in a row. 
Now that Jordan opened his own restaurant with the vision of "not merely creating food, but preferably creating happiness," he and his excellent staff will continue to strive to provide the best food and service to their precious customers.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Chef Jordan's wonderful talented gift has arrived in North Vancouver, blending tasty fusion of Japanese and Korean inspired cuisine that is sure to satisfy your cravings and leave you smiling for more.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Exotic Sushi in North Vancouver!

We believe in making healthy, delicious food attainable and sustainable -- leading to a healthy and happy life for everyone.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Vietnamese restaurant serving pho, vermicelli bowls, spring rolls, egg rolls, beef stew, rice entrees, Vietnamese subs, noodle soups, curry chicken, seafood chow mein, fried rice, etc.. Check our our menu!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:

So when is you next event? Is it a special birthday party? Corporate event? or perhaps a friendly gathering? Relax and let Haida catering handle the food part and you just enjoy!

You can place your order and pick it up, or have it delivered to your home or office. Also you can host your parties with our special catering menu.

Our thin and thick pan crust pizzas made from scratch using slow simmered sauces, fresh veggies and quality artisan meats. Gluten free crust is also available in the store.

Fryingpan Express: Best Fried Chicken in North Vancouver. Crispy Nashville-style chicken, spice your way. Perfect for lunch, dinner, or a quick bite. Located at 1455 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver. Fresh, halal, fast—no fuss, just bold flavors.

Tequila Cantina Located at 1933 Lonsdale Street with plenty of parking, Tequila Cantina is your go-to destination for authentic Mexican cuisine in a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere. We pride ourselves on serving the finest, freshest ingredients inspired by the rich flavour of Mexico  . 
Every Friday night, immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere with live mariachi music, adding a festive touch to your dining experience,  We also cater to all dietary preferences with our delicious vegetarian menu and a fun, tasty kids' menu to keep our younger guests happy. 

At Tequila Cantina, we offer a memorable dining experience with a welcoming atmosphere and excellent service. Come and enjoy the authentic flavors of Mexico!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: A proven leader in the restaurant industry, I have built a reputation of cooking truly authentic Greek cuisine.  My mission is to influence and inspire good nutrition and healthy eating habits by sharing my family's time honoured authentic traditional recipes that are made with all natural quality ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Growing up as a little boy in a traditional Greek household my mother made everything from "scratch" using only the freshest and the highest quality ingredients. When I was in my teens my father opened a Greek restaurant in North Vancouver and I started working in the kitchen learning traditional Greek cooking from his Greek chefs. They taught me to cook with the finest ingredients to create quality dishes with flavour that honoured my heritage.

Each year I looked forward to traveling to Greece to visit my "yiayia", my grandma. Her home cooked meals were always the highlight of my visit. There was nothing like the freshly picked sun-ripened vegetables from her garden and from the local markets. The memories are still fresh in my mind to this day.

It has been a dream of mine to introduce to you food that is delicious, memorable, natural and healthy.  I founded "O SO GREEK" to share my family's time honoured authentic traditional recipes that have been passed down for generations.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
O So Greek Food Ltd. - Traditional Family Recipes

O So Greek - Specialty Products
  
O So Greek - Catering

We specialize in grab & go Jamaican street food including Jamaican patties, Coco Bread, BBQ Jerk Chicken, Mac N Cheese & more. 

All food is handcrafted, made from scratch and is authentic. We provide curb-side pickup, delivery, wholesale and catering for events and everything in between!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: A specialized menu that can help you easily manage your party or gathering can't be found as easy as it sounds. You probably even search for catering in Vancouver many times but all results look the same. Well look no more! Haida catering in Vancouver has a proven record and a big number of happy customers who trusted Haida and let us bring food to their parties, birthdays, gatherings and ceremonies. Using Haida's optimized online ordering for catering you can choose from a variety of options and then relax and let us do the rest of the work.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Catering in Vancouver has just gotten simpler and better with Haida Catering. From formal and corporate events to parties and gatherings, Haida Sandwich offers top-notch catering services for every small to the big occasion. Choose our convenient and fast catering service and then just relax and enjoy the happy celebration. 

You will be pleasantly surprised not just by the extraordinarily delicious food that we will deliver to you, but also by our exceptionally affordable catering prices. Now, that's what we call the ideal combination! Check out our extensive food menu to decide what you want for your party now.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our story began in an RV, our little traveling home in which we, and our two wonderful cat-kids, moved all the way from QC to BC, which was a sublime experience! Through this journey, our fascination for adventure in nature, accompanied with our passion about veganism, made us realize how our life-changing transition to veganism is strikingly similar to this adventurous tour that brought us to this beautiful, exhilarating and colorful piece of earth that we now call home. That was our epiphany, the moment that ‘Rvegan Tour’ was born of our vegan tour.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Rvegan Tour we offer 100% plant-based, vegan, pre-packaged, ready to eat foods that add vareity to your meals. Our foods are versatile, easy, convenient, inherently gluten free, and healthy. Great for environment and definitly better for animals too.

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Catering and Delivery

We specialize in catering many different events and ceremonies. Get in touch with our team to learn how we can make your event one to remember.

Please note, orders must be paid for in store. For your convenience, we accept cash, Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Interac.

When placing a catering or delivery order for your event, please be sure to provide the following information:
Date of the event
Time and location
Number of people
Your thoughts and ideas about the menu
Your budget

Cakes

Whether you are hosting a formal wedding or a birthday party, you'll make the event special with one of our custom cakes.

The best way contact us to place an order or receive a personalized quote is by email.

For the most efficient response, please provide the following information in your request:
Date of the event
Time and location
Number of people
Your thoughts and ideas about the cake design
Your budget

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant. 

Our mission is to provide the best Sushi in town using the freshest ingredients. Always with a smile, we strive to satisfy your appetite for Sushi with delicious foods and speedy services.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Founded in 2005 at Hastings and Richards Street in downtown Vancouver, Waves has been blazing the trail for with superbly fresh brewed coffee, a commitment to local craftsmanship and community, and incomparable service.
In 2008, we were recognized by the Brand Coaches as the Hottest Brand in Canada. We have also been recognized as the Best of Brands by over 1,500 coffee retailers.
Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.
Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

For Papa John's Pizza in North Vancouver, BC, the secret to success is much like the secret to making a better pizza - the more you put into it, the more you get out of it. Whether it's our signature sauce, toppings, our original fresh dough, or even the box itself, we invest in our ingredients to ensure that we always give you the finest quality pizza. For you, it's not just Better Ingredients. Better Pizza. It's a family gathering, memorable birthday, work celebration or simply a great meal. It's our goal to make sure you always have the best ingredients for every occasion. Call us at (604) 988-8323 for delivery or stop by Lynn Valley Rd for carryout to order your favorite, pizza, breadsticks, or wings today!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lovers of cooking and baking. After 10 years of working in the food and beverage industry, we wanted to start over our own thing with one of the smallest carts here, YVR. We are happy when pork butt is being braised, mushrooms are being chopped, and butter is melting. Our dream only gets bigger with food lovers like you
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Cooking, Eating and Laughing is what makes us happy and happier. Ohh, can't miss drinking. We wanted to share what makes us happy with people like you.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are offering simple and bold Korean inspired dishes including Rice Bowls with a choice of BBQ Pork, Chili Chicken, Beef Meatball and Vegan Tofu.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: By 1996, The Butler Did It Catering Co. had built a healthy customer base and had vastly outgrown their little starter kitchen. Darryl began the long and exhaustive search for a new location that would eventually include a café. Out of the blue, a brochure arrived in the mail offering an ideal commercial kitchen with a 16-seat café for lease in Kitsilano. It was perfect. They moved into the premises in May, renovated, and opened for business in June of 1997. Over the 7 years in that location they nurtured a growing loyal catering clientele, and developed a great rapport with their neighbourhood by offering a consistent variety of healthy, delicious food.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Butler Did It Catering Co. was founded in 1994 by three young, enthusiastic entrepreneurs: Darryl Ray, Jamie, and Erin Avantini. Each partner brought knowledge from the different aspects of the Food & Beverage industry. Darryl and Erin worked together at The Brockhouse Restaurant on the West Side of Vancouver perfecting their front of house service, while Jamie was a Chef at the Westin Bayshore. It was during this time - while they were beginning to do some freelance off-premise catering - that they came across a faltering catering/food product business for sale. Soon enough with their profits, support of friends and family, and a minimally equipped 450 sq. foot kitchen, they were off and cooking!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Lynn Canyon Café is located in the spectacular Lynn Canyon Park.

Whether you're enjoying a world class hike or just visiting the incredible free suspension bridge, the Lynn Canyon Cafe has everything you need. The menu has a wonderful selection including tasty soups; fresh made panini's and a delicious BBQ pulled pork sandwich, as well as some classic comforts like Poutine and Burgers.
For beverages we are serving Starbucks coffees, Tazo teas and local beer by Bridge Brewery.

Looking for a venue for your special event? Our 2nd floor mezzanine is available to rent.

A beautiful space nestled in Lynn Canyon Park. The Mezzanine is an impressive space with a soaring ceiling and large outdoor private deck. Hiking and outdoor nature activities are literally at your doorstep. Great for meetings, retreats, corporate events, birthday and family celebrations.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
My experience comes from working in the hospitality industry for over 25 years. Front of house, back of house and everywhere in between. I found the best way to be good at my job is to know all the ins and outs of every position, so thats what I did. Bartend, manage, serve, cook and clean...I did it all! My days are spent in the kitchen baking, learning and creating. I can honestly say there is no better feeling than creating new and beautiful desserts. From the flavour profile to the last little decorative detail that goes on at the end.

Chef Tamera Clark
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Gourmet Dessert Bars 
Breakfast, lunch & drink offerings 
Catering & Wholesale 
Weddings Sweet Tables & Cakes

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Overlooking the Capilano Canyon and nestled in the West Coast rainforest, the 150-seat indoor & outdoor restaurant focuses on local ingredients, Ocean Wise seafood products, BC wines and locally crafted beers on tap. The Cliff House restaurant will offer visitors a welcome respite after a busy day of touring the Park.
*The Cliff House Restaurant is accessible only to guests of Capilano Suspension Bridge Park
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located in beautiful Capilano Suspension Bridge Park, the Cliff House overlooks the Capilano Canyon and is nestled in the West Coast rainforest, the 150-seat indoor & outdoor restaurant focuses on local ingredients, Ocean Wise seafood products, BC wines and locally crafted beers on tap.
Open daily starting at 12pm, Happy hour from 3-6pm.  North Vancouver's only VPN Certified Neapolitan Pizzeria.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: One of the first Neighbourhood Pubs to open in North Vancouver, The Queens Cross sits at the top of the Lonsdale business corridor at Queens Road and Lonsdale.  It is a true Neighbourhood Pub where many patrons have been visiting since day one.  It has always been a place for people of all age groups (must be of legal drinking age) to meet with friends, hang out and take in the atmosphere.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We set the standard in good quality pub food.  Draft beer is always served in a 20 ounce pint and there is always a great view of the game or TV event in HD.   Live entertainment on weekends and a great atmosphere for teams and groups.  Outdoor patio gets sunshine all day and the upstairs room is perfect for private parties and large groups.  For over thirty years, the Queens Cross has been a local favorite with a warm atmosphere and friendly staff and patrons.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
I grew up in North Vancouver went to school here 
have 2 children 1 boy and 1 girl and 1 more on the way
Very happy to live on the North Shore
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
voted best pizza in vancouver 5 times!

we try to use as much organic ingredients as possible
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
When Andrew Started Rebellious Tomato 10 years ago, he wanted to create fabulous food to satisfy his pregnant wife's cravings without compromising her health. He chose The Organic Concept.

Andrew chooses fresh, organic ingredients (when possible) that appeal to everyone, including toddlers, mother-to-be, and seniors.

Our pizzas represent great taste and good nutrition. That's why we have been voted "Best Pizza" in Vancouver and the North Shore again and again! Give us a call tonight and enjoy a delicious meal with the whole family!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Alex is founder C.C. Sun 's grandson, taking over the family business to the third generation.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
CC's - Capilano Heights is back with a new brand image!

Long time serving the North Vancouver, we are back with a new brand image.

CC's Chinese Restaurant presented by Drunken Monkey

In loving memory of C.c. Sun, we rename Capilano Heights with his name. And this time, we are going to bring some new flavour with Drunken Monkey, a restaurant Cc's grandson, Alex, opened in Taipei, Taiwan. Besides bringing some Taiwanese style dishes in the restaurant, Drunken Monkey cooking class is also on its way to open!

C.c. Sun, started Capilano Heights in 1972 and is very proud to have served many, many happy customers. We offer a wide-ranging menu together with a complete liquor, wine and beer selection at very reasonable prices. Our atmosphere is warm and casual, including an all glass atrium where customers can enjoy the garden view all year round. Please come and join us for a wonderful dining experience for all your friends and family. See you soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Online or call to order for Pick up and delivery via UberEats!

In addition to North American style Chinese cuisine, we are also offering authentic Cantonese and Taiwanese cuisine.

Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant. 

Our mission is to provide the best Sushi in town using the freshest ingredients. Always with a smile, we strive to satisfy your appetite for Sushi with delicious foods and speedy services.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Located at the heart of Lynn Valley, North Vancouver, Mr. Sushi is the first Sushi restaurant in town. With over 20 years of experience serving local residents, Mr. Sushi has become the neighbourhood favourite Sushi restaurant. 

Our mission is to provide the best Sushi in town using the freshest ingredients. Always with a smile, we strive to satisfy your appetite for Sushi with delicious foods and speedy services.
Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

For Papa John's Pizza in North Vancouver, BC, the secret to success is much like the secret to making a better pizza - the more you put into it, the more you get out of it. Whether it's our signature sauce, toppings, our original fresh dough, or even the box itself, we invest in our ingredients to ensure that we always give you the finest quality pizza. For you, it's not just Better Ingredients. Better Pizza. It's a family gathering, memorable birthday, work celebration or simply a great meal. It's our goal to make sure you always have the best ingredients for every occasion. Call us at (604) 988-8323 for delivery or stop by Lynn Valley Rd for carryout to order your favorite, pizza, breadsticks, or wings today!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: By 1996, The Butler Did It Catering Co. had built a healthy customer base and had vastly outgrown their little starter kitchen. Darryl began the long and exhaustive search for a new location that would eventually include a café. Out of the blue, a brochure arrived in the mail offering an ideal commercial kitchen with a 16-seat café for lease in Kitsilano. It was perfect. They moved into the premises in May, renovated, and opened for business in June of 1997. Over the 7 years in that location they nurtured a growing loyal catering clientele, and developed a great rapport with their neighbourhood by offering a consistent variety of healthy, delicious food.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Butler Did It Catering Co. was founded in 1994 by three young, enthusiastic entrepreneurs: Darryl Ray, Jamie, and Erin Avantini. Each partner brought knowledge from the different aspects of the Food & Beverage industry. Darryl and Erin worked together at The Brockhouse Restaurant on the West Side of Vancouver perfecting their front of house service, while Jamie was a Chef at the Westin Bayshore. It was during this time - while they were beginning to do some freelance off-premise catering - that they came across a faltering catering/food product business for sale. Soon enough with their profits, support of friends and family, and a minimally equipped 450 sq. foot kitchen, they were off and cooking!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Lynn Canyon Café is located in the spectacular Lynn Canyon Park.

Whether you're enjoying a world class hike or just visiting the incredible free suspension bridge, the Lynn Canyon Cafe has everything you need. The menu has a wonderful selection including tasty soups; fresh made panini's and a delicious BBQ pulled pork sandwich, as well as some classic comforts like Poutine and Burgers.
For beverages we are serving Starbucks coffees, Tazo teas and local beer by Bridge Brewery.

Looking for a venue for your special event? Our 2nd floor mezzanine is available to rent.

A beautiful space nestled in Lynn Canyon Park. The Mezzanine is an impressive space with a soaring ceiling and large outdoor private deck. Hiking and outdoor nature activities are literally at your doorstep. Great for meetings, retreats, corporate events, birthday and family celebrations.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Observatory is the crown jewel of the dining experiences available at The Peak of Vancouver, Grouse Mountain.  Situated at 3700' above the City of Vancouver it truly is an awe inspiring experience to enjoy dinner at this world class venue.  The Observatory maintains an extensive global wine cellar giving the ability to pair wine to every dish.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: The Observatory executes modern West Coast cuisine with focus on local and sustainable ingredients.  Every plate is prepared with the attention necessary to make each dish an edible work of art.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Alex is founder C.C. Sun 's grandson, taking over the family business to the third generation.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
CC's - Capilano Heights is back with a new brand image!

Long time serving the North Vancouver, we are back with a new brand image.

CC's Chinese Restaurant presented by Drunken Monkey

In loving memory of C.c. Sun, we rename Capilano Heights with his name. And this time, we are going to bring some new flavour with Drunken Monkey, a restaurant Cc's grandson, Alex, opened in Taipei, Taiwan. Besides bringing some Taiwanese style dishes in the restaurant, Drunken Monkey cooking class is also on its way to open!

C.c. Sun, started Capilano Heights in 1972 and is very proud to have served many, many happy customers. We offer a wide-ranging menu together with a complete liquor, wine and beer selection at very reasonable prices. Our atmosphere is warm and casual, including an all glass atrium where customers can enjoy the garden view all year round. Please come and join us for a wonderful dining experience for all your friends and family. See you soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Online or call to order for Pick up and delivery via UberEats!

In addition to North American style Chinese cuisine, we are also offering authentic Cantonese and Taiwanese cuisine.

Offering a selection of fast and delicious meals and specialty coffee beverages, the Grouse Grind® Coffee Bar is ideal for those looking for fresh food on the go. Refuel after a grueling Grouse Grind® or snowshoe with a hit of caffeine, a delicious pastry, or choose from a selection of hearty new dishes.
Donairs & kabob
